original_text: Some of the people who had heard Paul's message joined his group. They believed the good news about Jesus. One of these believers was a man called Dionysius. He belonged to the group of important officers. A woman called Damaris also became a believer. Several other people also believed Paul's message about Jesus.
korean_text: 몇 사람이 그를 가까이하여 믿으니 그 중에는 아레오바고 관리 디오누시오와 다마리라 하는 여자와 또 다른 사람들도 있었더라

sentences.original_text: Some of the people who had heard Paul's message
sentences.korean_translation: 바울의 메시지를 들은 사람들 중 일부는

sentences.original_text: They believed the good news about Jesus.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 예수에 대한 좋은 소식을 믿었습니다.

sentences.original_text: One of these believers was a man called Dionysius.
sentences.korean_translation: 이 신자들 중 한 사람은 디오니시오라는 사람이었습니다.

sentences.original_text: He belonged to the group of important officers.
A woman called Damaris also became a believer.
Several other people also believed Paul's message about Jesus.
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 여러 사람들도 바울의 예수에 대한 메시지를 믿었습니다.
